mapper.sql: SELECT PAGING.* FROM ( SELECT ORACLE_PAGING.* , ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (
) ORACLE_PAGING WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endCount} ) PAGING WHERE RNUM >= #{startCount}
mapper.select:
SELECT TS.SEND_TO_CAR_ID, TS.TARGET_NM, TS.TARGET_ADDRESS, TS.TARGET_LONX, TS.TARGET_LATY, TS.SEND_STATUS, TS.USE_YN, TO_CHAR(TS.ARRIV_HOPE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ARRIV_HOPE_TIME, TS.EST_TIME, TS.REG_ID,
TS.UPD_ID, TO_CHAR(TS.UPD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPD_DT, TS.MEMB_ID, TS.MGRAPP_ID, TS.SERVICE_TYPE, TS.RSV_TYPE, TS.SVR_ID, (SELECT HOST_NM FROM TB_SVR_INFO WHERE SVR_ID = TS.SVR_ID) as HOST_NM, TS.SCHEDULE_ID, TCD.DEVICE_CTN, TMU.MGRAPP_LOGIN_ID, TMU.MGRAPP_CTN FROM TB_SEND2CAR TS, TB_CONN_DEVICE TCD, TB_MGRAPP_USER TMU WHERE 1=1 AND TS.MEMB_ID = TCD.MEMB_ID AND TS.MGRAPP_ID = TMU.MGRAPP_ID
AND TS.PROCESS_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') and TS.PROCESS_DT < TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY TS.PROCESS_DT DESC

SELECT TS.SEND_TO_CAR_ID, TS.TARGET_NM, TS.TARGET_ADDRESS, TS.TARGET_LONX, TS.TARGET_LATY, TS.SEND_STATUS, TS.USE_YN, TO_CHAR(TS.ARRIV_HOPE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ARRIV_HOPE_TIME, TS.EST_TIME, TS.REG_ID,
TS.UPD_ID, TO_CHAR(TS.UPD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPD_DT, TS.MEMB_ID, TS.MGRAPP_ID, TS.SERVICE_TYPE, TS.RSV_TYPE, TS.SVR_ID, (SELECT HOST_NM FROM TB_SVR_INFO WHERE SVR_ID = TS.SVR_ID) as HOST_NM, TS.SCHEDULE_ID, TCD.DEVICE_CTN, TMU.MGRAPP_LOGIN_ID, TMU.MGRAPP_CTN FROM TB_SEND2CAR TS, TB_CONN_DEVICE TCD, TB_MGRAPP_USER TMU WHERE 1=1 AND TS.MEMB_ID = TCD.MEMB_ID AND TS.MGRAPP_ID = TMU.MGRAPP_ID AND TS.SEND_TO_CAR_ID = #{sendToCarId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT TS.SEND_TO_CAR_ID, TS.TARGET_NM, TS.TARGET_ADDRESS, TS.TARGET_LONX, TS.TARGET_LATY, TS.SEND_STATUS, TS.USE_YN, TO_CHAR(TS.ARRIV_HOPE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ARRIV_HOPE_TIME, TS.EST_TIME, TS.REG_ID,
TS.UPD_ID, TO_CHAR(TS.UPD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPD_DT, TS.MEMB_ID, TS.MGRAPP_ID, TS.SERVICE_TYPE, TS.RSV_TYPE, TS.SVR_ID, (SELECT HOST_NM FROM TB_SVR_INFO WHERE SVR_ID = TS.SVR_ID) as HOST_NM, TS.SCHEDULE_ID, TCD.DEVICE_CTN, TMU.MGRAPP_LOGIN_ID, TMU.MGRAPP_CTN FROM TB_SEND2CAR TS, TB_CONN_DEVICE TCD, TB_MGRAPP_USER TMU WHERE 1=1 AND TS.MEMB_ID = TCD.MEMB_ID AND TS.MGRAPP_ID = TMU.MGRAPP_ID
AND TS.PROCESS_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') and TS.PROCESS_DT < TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY TS.PROCESS_DT DESC )

SELECT ORACLE_PAGING.* , ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT TS.SEND_TO_CAR_ID, TS.TARGET_NM, TS.TARGET_ADDRESS, TS.TARGET_LONX, TS.TARGET_LATY, TS.SEND_STATUS, TS.USE_YN, TO_CHAR(TS.ARRIV_HOPE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ARRIV_HOPE_TIME, TS.EST_TIME, TS.REG_ID,
TS.UPD_ID, TO_CHAR(TS.UPD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPD_DT, TS.MEMB_ID, TS.MGRAPP_ID,
(SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM TB_DTL_CD WHERE GRP_CD_ID = (SELECT GRP_CD_ID FROM TB_GROUP_CD WHERE GRP_CD_NM='SEND2CAR_SERVICE_TYPE' ) AND CD_VAL= TS.SERVICE_TYPE) as SERVICE_TYPE, TS.RSV_TYPE, TS.SVR_ID, (SELECT HOST_NM FROM TB_SVR_INFO WHERE SVR_ID = TS.SVR_ID) as HOST_NM, TS.SCHEDULE_ID, TCD.DEVICE_CTN, TMU.MGRAPP_LOGIN_ID, TMU.MGRAPP_CTN FROM TB_SEND2CAR TS, TB_CONN_DEVICE TCD, TB_MGRAPP_USER TMU WHERE 1=1 AND TS.MEMB_ID = TCD.MEMB_ID AND TS.MGRAPP_ID = TMU.MGRAPP_ID
AND TS.PROCESS_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') and TS.PROCESS_DT < TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY TS.PROCESS_DT DESC ) ORACLE_PAGING
